page.title: 19CLINICS IN CHINGFORD
page.content: You go to clinics when you are well. The staff in the clinic are very helpful.If you go there when you are ill they will send you to a doctor or hospital.The staff at the clinic give you information on how to keep healthy There are many different clinics in one building,held in various rooms. For instance,there are the baby,cancer ,old people's,pregnant mother's,test, X-ray,verruca and dental clinics all under one roof.They are staffed by many different trained specialists.The nurse in the baby clinic has to do an extra year in college. The clinic is very clean and is scrub bed everyday to keep germs away. A cure has never been found for cancer but diseases like measles,T.B, and Polio can be prevented by immun- isation.
